sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使用，应用"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: use, apply, employ, utilize, avail, exploit
means: use ： 普通用词，着重为达到某一目的而利用某人或某物。
apply ： 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
employ ： 指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与use换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。
utilize ： 侧重有利可图或能达到某一实际目的。书面用词。
avail ： 通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。

sentence.Network_en: The Romans were the first to utilize concrete as a building material.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗马人首先使用混凝土作建筑材料。

sentence.Network_en: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings.
sentence.Network_cn: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

sentence.Network_en: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentence.Network_cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... misuse v 错用；虐待 utilize v 利用 utility n 公用事业；有用.
utilit+ar+ian+ism 实用主义-功利主义utilize 使用use

list.abs: 效用（UTILITY）：对消费者在消费商品时所感受到的满足程度的度量，通常假设该度量本质上是序数的而非基数的。福利经济学（W…
PDMS_百度百科 ... Settings 设置 Utilities 工具（utility） Create 生成.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French utiliser, from Italian utilizzare, from utile (see utile)

entry.def: If you utilize something, you use it.

example.ex: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings...
example.tran: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

example.ex: Minerals can be absorbed and utilized by the body in a variety of different forms.
example.tran: 人体可通过很多不同形式吸收和利用矿物质。

means.word_mean: 1. put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose;

sentences.sentence: "I can't make use of this tool"
"This thinking was applied to many projects"
"I apply this rule to get good results"
"use the plastic bags to store the food"
"He doesn't know how to use a computer"

means.word_mean: 2. convert (from an investment trust to a unit trust)

auth_sentence.content: Many individuals and organizations around the world already utilize ESD in their daily lives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many individuals and organizations around the world already utilize ESD in their daily lives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many individuals and organizations around the world already utilize ESD in their daily lives.

auth_sentence.content: The Aspire 5670 will utilize ATI's Mobility Radeon X1600 GPU and Avivo high-def acceleration.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Aspire 5670 will utilize ATI's Mobility Radeon X1600 GPU and Avivo high-def acceleration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Aspire 5670 will utilize ATI's Mobility Radeon X1600 GPU and Avivo high-def acceleration.

auth_sentence.content: SSDs utilize flash memory for data storage rather than the spinning platters found in conventional hard disk drives.
auth_sentence.res_content: SSDs utilize flash memory for data storage rather than the spinning platters found in conventional hard disk drives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: SSDs utilize flash memory for data storage rather than the spinning platters found in conventional hard disk drives.

stems_affixes.word_buile: utility[n.效用,有用,实用]+arian……的→utilitarian有用的,实利的
ut=util用+ensil表物品→用的物品→用具
util用+ity表名词→n.效用,有用,实用

Sentence.sentence: The company just released an updated version last week, and it'll be utilized in over 50 undergraduate and graduate classrooms this coming school year.

sentences.en: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
sentences.cn: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨做汤。

sentences.en: It is to be hoped that in her new job her talents will be better utilized than before.
sentences.cn: 希望在她的新岗位上她的才干能够比以往得到更好的发挥。

jushi.english: The cook will utilize the leftover ham bone to make soup.
jushi.chinese: 厨师要用吃剩的猪腿骨煮汤。

jushi.english: It is to be hoped that in her new job her talents will be better utilized than before.
jushi.chinese: 希望在她的新岗位上她的才干能够比以往得到更好的发挥。
